title: I can't boot my OG Pixel
content:
I left my phone on the charger and found like this
It showed completely messed up bootloader screens, here are a few(if i press the power button, it changes):
https://ibb.co/c1GXMDw
https://ibb.co/T0Z0BqV
https://ibb.co/vLTnnct

If i long(20s) all the 3 buttons, I'm able to get to this working menu(bit the reboot and the power off button takes me back to the messed up screen, and the recovery menu button takes me to a white screen wich says: unable to load recovery menu):
https://ibb.co/74myDDB

I have tried a few thing with adb, but i couldn't achieve anything:
https://ibb.co/Mk7Kpg6
https://ibb.co/kqXWFQ2
https://ibb.co/59Tc1zF
